void Vec2Project ( Vec2 *  Result,
Vec2 *  Operand1,
Vec2 *  Operand2 
)

Projects one vector onto another.

Parameters:
ResultVector of the result of the projection
Operand1Vector to project
Operand2Vector to project onto

Definition at line 193 of file Vector2.c.

{
        //Vector b onto a
        // b = Op1, a = Op2

        float scalar; // (a . b) / (a . a)

        scalar = Vec2DotProduct(Operand2, Operand1) / Vec2DotProduct(Operand2, Operand2);

        Vec2Scale(Result, Operand2, scalar);
}
void Vec2RotateDegrees ( Vec2 *  Result,
float  Degrees 
)

Rotates a vector by a specified degrees.

Parameters:
ResultVector to be rotated
DegreesNumber of degrees to be rotated

Definition at line 334 of file Vector2.c.

{
        //float length = Vec2Length(Result);
        float radians = 2 * M_PI * Degrees / 360.0f;
        float resultX = Result->x * cos(radians) - Result->y * sin(radians);
        float resultY = Result->x * sin(radians) + Result->y * cos(radians);

        Vec2Set(Result, resultX, resultY);
}

float Vec2SquareDistance ( Vec2 *  Operand1,
Vec2 *  Operand2 
)

Calculates the square of the distance between 2 vectors.

Parameters:
Operand1Vector to calculate the distance of
Operand2Vector to calculate the distance of
Returns:
Value of the square distance between the 2 vectors

Definition at line 274 of file Vector2.c.

{
        float x_square;
        float y_square;

        x_square = (Operand1->x - Operand2->x) * (Operand1->x - Operand2->x);
        y_square = (Operand1->y - Operand2->y) * (Operand1->y - Operand2->y);

        return (x_square + y_square);
}
